summary: Diff implements new global theme tokens and adds a warm/neutral `.hero-overlay` utility plus new CTA utility classes, but it also introduces unrelated Secretary navigation/deep-link logic changes and does not provide clear evidence of the new hero image asset/caching changes required by REQ-1.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the homepage hero background image to a real-life community collaboration photograph with a warmer/neutral overall color balance, and ensure the hero section renders the updated asset reliably (no stale/cached image on refresh).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no new/changed image asset file (no files added) and the `App.tsx` change is truncated, so there is insufficient evidence that the hero background references the new warm image filename/version for cache-busting and that object-cover/full-bleed behavior is preserved.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix CTA/button styling issues so the header "Get Started" button is never white text on a white (or near-white) background, and refine CTA buttons to a colorful teal-forward palette consistent with the existing accent tokens and hover/focus states.
missing_requirements.reason: While new CTA utility classes are introduced in `index.css`, the `App.tsx` diff is truncated and does not provide direct evidence that the header "Get Started" button specifically uses these classes or otherwise has guaranteed contrast in both light/dark modes, including hover/active/focus-visible states.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (truncated): header/button usage not fully visible

hallucinated_features.description: Secretary navigation registry and deep-link handling logic added/modified in App component.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists "No changes to Secretary navigation/deep-linking logic" as a non-goal, but `App.tsx` shows new imports and logic using `useSecretaryNavigationRegistry` and `parseDeepLink`, and registers navigation destinations and handles deep links on mount.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (truncated): imports `useSecretaryNavigationRegistry`, `parseDeepLink`; registers destinations; handles deep links

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/token overhaul (OKLCH token values for many CSS variables) beyond hero/overlay/button refinements.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request is narrowly scoped to hero image/overlay and CTA contrast fixes; `index.css` modifies a large set of global CSS variables (background, foreground, card, popover, secondary, muted, border, etc.) for both light and dark mode, which is broader than the requested visual refinements.

hallucinated_features.description: New Tailwind theme extensions (glow shadows, animations/keyframes, additional color variants) not explicitly requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for new animation/glow utilities; `tailwind.config.js` adds glow shadows and keyframes/animations (fade-in-up/fade-in) and extends palette variants.
